children.name: setStartAngle
children.description: Sets the start angle of the arc in decimal degrees.Measured in clockwise direction with 0 pointing "right".

children.name: setRadiusY
children.description: Sets the y radius of the arc.

children.name: setRadiusX
children.description: Sets the x radius of the arc.

children.name: setEndAngle
children.description: Sets the end angle of the arc in decimal degrees.Measured in clockwise direction with 0 pointing "right".

children.name: pointAt

parameters.name: angle `Number`
parameters.description: Angle in decimal degrees. Measured in clockwise direction with 0 pointing "right".Negative values or values greater than 360 will be normalized.

children.description: Gets the location of a point on the arc's circumference at a given angle.

children.name: getStartAngle
children.description: Gets the start angle of the arc in decimal degrees.Measured in clockwise direction with 0 pointing "right".

children.name: getRadiusY
children.description: Gets the y radius of the arc.

children.name: getRadiusX
children.description: Gets the x radius of the arc.

children.name: getEndAngle
children.description: Gets the end angle of the arc in decimal degrees.Measured in clockwise direction with 0 pointing "right".

children.name: bbox
children.description: Returns the bounding box of this arc after applying the specified transformation matrix.
